description.value: A clinical scale measuring the depth of therapeutic empathy in nurse-patient interactions. Traditional EHRs ignore this; the Super-Gold Standard makes it a primary outcome.

display.value: Low Empathy: Task-focused interaction with minimal person-centred engagement.
Basic Empathy: Professional interaction with patient identity acknowledged.
Moderate Empathy: Active relational engagement with shared decision making.
High Empathy: Authentic partnership with deep understanding of patient experience.
Relational Excellence: Flourishing partnership with total alignment on 'What Matters to Me'.
